lead_paragraph: Just days before he was shot and killed Sunday morning, a Baton Rouge police officer posted an emotional Facebook message saying he was "physically and emotionally" tired and expressing how difficult it was to be both a police officer and a black man, a friend said Sunday.

headline.main: Family and Friends Remember Slain Baton Rouge Officers
headline.print_headline: Family and Friends Remember Slain Baton Rouge Officers
